name: Over the Rainbow Pendant
description:
Rainbow glitter filled pendant with hand drawn, water coloured and varnished label. Finished with a cute little enamelled rainbow and clouds charm.


Bottled Treasures jewellery is made to order and will be posted within 5 working days of receiving payment. As each piece is individually handmade, there may be slight variations from the photographs but this is what makes your pendant unique! 


All prices include a 27" bronze coloured ball chain. Pendants are carefully wrapped in tissue paper inside a padded envelope to keep them safe on their journey to you.

name: Single Christmas Light Pendant

Bottled Treasures jewellery is made to order and will be posted within 5 working days of receiving payment. As each piece is individually handmade, there may be slight variations from the photographs but this is what makes your pendant unique!

name: Wish Upon Illustrated Print/Notebook
description:
This cute digital collaged 'Wish Upon a Star' illustration is available as an A4 print or A5 notebook. The stars were created using a mix of gold and silver coloured patterns and textures, one star is brighter than the rest: a shooting star - make a wish!

The notebook has 28 plain white pages (including a 'this book belongs to' page). Printed products are packaged wrapped in a cellophane cover and shipped in a card backed envelope.

name: Eat Me Illustrated Print/Notebook
description:
This cute digital collaged 'Eat Me' illustration is available as an A4 print or A5 notebook. The cupcakes were created using a mix of pastel coloured patterns and textures, one cupcake features the Alice in Wonderland inspired 'Eat Me' tag.


The notebook has 28 plain white pages (including a 'this book belongs to' page). Printed products are packaged wrapped in a cellophane cover and shipped in a card backed envelope.

name: Poison Apples Illustrated Print/Notebook
description:

The notebook has 28 plain white pages (including a 'this book belongs to' page). Printed products are packaged wrapped in a cellophane cover and shipped in a card backed envelope.

name: Once Upon Illustrated Print/Notebook
description:
